special_abilities.name: Funeral Pyre.
descriptions: When Vanifer drops to 0 hit points, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day).
descriptions: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Vanifer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Vanifer knows the following sorcerer spells:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, message, produce flame, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, message, produce flame, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, hellish rebuke, shield
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, hellish rebuke, shield

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): darkness, detect thoughts, misty step, scorching ray
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): darkness, detect thoughts, misty step, scorching ray

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, hypnotic pattern

actions.name: Tinderstrike.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.
